name: Chicken with Shrimp Carbonara
description: Grilled chicken and succulent shrimp served with carbonara sauce over spaghetti.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce smothered over tender grilled chicken breast and fettuccine pasta.

name: Chicken Parmigiana
description: Crispy breaded chicken cutlet with marinara sauce and a trio of melted cheeses.

name: Tour of Italy
description: Embark on a culinary journey with homemade lasagna, chicken Parmigiana, and fettuccine Alfredo.

name: Shrimp Alfredo
description: Tender shrimp nestled in a bed of fettuccine pasta, bathed in a rich and creamy Parmesan sauce.

name: Chicken Marsala Fettuccine
description: Crispy breaded chicken breast crowned with marsala sauce and melted cheese, served over fettuccine.

name: Ravioli Carbonara
description: Delicious garlic shrimp saut√©ed in a white wine sauce, served over linguine.

name: Lasagna Classico
description: Indulge in layers of pasta, savory meat sauce, and three types of melted cheese, baked to perfection.

name: Spaghetti & Meatballs
description: Traditional spaghetti served with mouthwatering meatballs, topped with a blend of five cheeses and marinara sauce.

name: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce
description: Grilled chicken breast seasoned with roasted garlic, accompanied by spinach and sun-dried tomatoes in a creamy sauce.

name: Spaghetti with Marinara
description: Savor the taste of mushroom-filled ravioli drizzled in a creamy smoked cheese and sun-dried tomato sauce.

name: Chicken Tortelloni Alfredo
description: Grilled chicken breasts generously filled with a medley of Italian cheeses and crowned with mushrooms, all enveloped in a savory Marsala wine sauce.
